channel.title: Sports
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Sports, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: 10 Favorite Big Noon Kickoff Moments From the 2025 College Football Season
item.description: Here are our favorite FOX Big Noon Kickoff moments from this season.

item.title: Patriots Coach Mike Vrabel on Stefon Diggs Charges: 'Let Process Take its Toll'
item.description: Patriots HC Mike Vrabel says he hasn’t heard anything from the NFL that would stop Stefon Diggs, who faces charges, from playing.

item.title: Philip Rivers 'Doesn't Have Any Regrets' After Brief Return Comes to an End
item.description: Philip Rivers' brief comeback is over, but the 44-year-old quarterback doesn't have any regrets about his effort.

item.title: Cambridge Sisters Score 30 points to Put No. 19 Ohio State Over Purdue
item.description: The Cambridge sisters combined for 30 points — 16 by Kennedy and 14 from Jaloni — and No. 19 Ohio State routed Purdue 83-56.

item.title: CFP Quarterfinal Betting Report: Ole Miss-UGA Will Have Largest Impact at Books
item.description: Bookmakers are circling Sugar and sharps are all about Orange. Here's Patrick Everson with the inside scoop on the CFP quarterfinals betting action.

item.title: Pats' Barmore facing assault and battery charge
item.description: Patriots defensive tackle Christian Barmore is facing a misdemeanor charge of assault and battery on a household/family member stemming from an August...

item.title: 16 teams in the NFL playoff mix, 16 potential downfalls: Let's find each roster's fatal flaw
item.description: We found fatal flaws for all 12 clinched teams in the playoff field, plus the AFC North and NFC South teams trying to join them entering Week 18.

item.title: Missed Cowboys flight one factor in Diggs' release
item.description: Dallas Cowboys coach Brian Schottenheimer was adamant that the team did not release Trevon Diggs on Tuesday solely because the former Pro Bowl cornerb...

item.title: Colts' Richardson stays optimistic despite lost '25
item.description: Colts quarterback Anthony Richardson Sr. says he took finishing the 2025 season on injured reserve in stride and will enter 2026 optimistic about his ...

item.title: Source: Eagles plan to rest Hurts, other starters
item.description: Tanner McKee is expected to start at quarterback as the Eagles are planning to rest some starters against the Commanders, a source confirmed to ESPN.
